body:
Is there really any value in removing this? I left this out when doing a tracer refactor specifically because:
1. it doesn't hurt us
2. in case we need to stash something else in the future, all the code is simply there, and you don't need to grep for `Node*`, which appears *everywhere* in the JIT.
